compatibility.notes: The W3C license is designed to be permissive and compatible with other permissive licenses. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Ensure that the W3C Software Notice is viewable to users of the redistributed or derivative work.
Do not use the name and trademarks of copyright holders in advertising or publicity without permission.
license.name: W3C
obligations: Include the full text of the W3C Software Notice in all copies of the software and documentation.
Include any pre-existing intellectual property disclaimers, notices, or terms and conditions.
Provide notice of any changes or modifications to the files, including the date changes were made.
